recipe.title: Figure Friendly Mushroom and Bacon Strata
recipe.instructions:
Heat non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add oil and saute onion and peppers for 5 minutes to soften. Add mushrooms and saute another 5 minutes.
Spray baking dish with cooking spray and add bread cubes. Top with mushroom mixture, basil, and salt and pepper to your taste. Sprinkle with bacon bits and cheese.
Whip eggs and milk together and pour over bread mixture.
Refrigerate for one hour up to overnight.
Heat oven to 350. Bake 20 minutes covered with foil. Uncover and bake another 10 minutes until puffed and lightly browned.
recipe.summary: Figure Friendly Mushroom and Bacon Strata might be a good recipe to expand your main course recipe box. This recipe serves 4. For $1.5 per serving, this recipe covers 28% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 519 calories, 29g of protein, and 17g of fat. It is brought to you by Foodista. 3 people have made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. A mixture of eggs, bacon bits, olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. With a spoonacular score of 45%, this dish is solid. Figure Friendly Strawberry Cheesecake, Mushroom, Bacon, and Swiss Strata, and Mushroom Bacon Breakfast Strata are very similar to this recipe.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons bacon bits, use real bacon bits
